title: Apple Reacts to Their New EU App Store Rules
description:
Apple has revealed how it’s complying with the new EU Digital Markets Act with alternate app stores, payment processors and a big middle finger.

Apple Press Release: https://www.apple.com/newsroom/2024/01/apple-announces-changes-to-ios-safari-and-the-app-store-in-the-european-union/
